committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, U.S. Postal Service, and Labor Policy

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to permit the transfer of sick leave in leave-transfer programs, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Employees Leave Transfer Act of 2011
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Federal Employees Leave Transfer Act of 2011 - Directs the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) to modify by regulation the program for voluntary transfer of unused leave to allow federal employees to transfer unused sick leave and contribute such leave to agency leave banks for the use of other employees, on the same basis as is allowed for annual leave.

titles.title: Federal Employees Leave Transfer Act of 2011
To amend title 5, United States Code, to permit the transfer of sick leave in leave-transfer programs, and for other purposes.
